positive.title: In Atlantic City, Strong Opinions on Donald Trump Before N.J. Primary
positive.subtext: Even though Donald Trump has left Atlantic City, his name still adorns the Trump Taj Mahal and has the power to provoke strong reactions from residents and visitors.

neutral.title: Trumps 3500 lawsuits unprecedented for a presidential nominee
neutral.subtext: Our project found about 3,500 legal actions involving Trump, including 1,900 where he or his companies were a plaintiff and about 1,300 in which he was the defendant

negative.title: Donald Trump and Chris Christie, the Twin Villains of Atlantic City
negative.subtext: Residents of the nearly bankrupt boardwalk town gripe about the moguls failed casinos and the governorâ€™s power play.
